text: June Lockhart (born June 25, 1925) is an American actress. She acts primarily on television programs. She worked mostly in the 1950s and 1960s. She played Timmy's mother in the long-running Lassie. She appeared later in Lost In Space. She also played Doctor Janet Craig in the sitcom Petticoat Junction. June Lockhart will turn 100 in June 25, 2025. Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:1925 births Category:Living people
title: June Lockhart
